input.sentences: after having some food at the cafe we decided to have a seat outside .
there were many horses going by because of the race taking place nearby .
a lot of the horses and riders were competitors .
we decided to go and check out the race after sitting for a while .
when we got the race track we stayed to watch the races .
output.sentences: Lets start the day with a nice bowl of soup.
This horse is certain to win.
Look at those long beautiful legs on that horse.
Lets get warmed up for the race.
And they are off to the finish line.
